FUNFACT: Jakarta is one of the few cities in South East Asia with the largest number of museums in the city
ABOUT_FI: FunIndonesia is an application for users to know more about Indonesia and its culture. This application was made in accordance to Computer Science Innovative Challenge made by Universitas Multimedia Nusantara. We hope by this application everyone can learn something new about Indonesia whether you are a foreigner or a native.
HAB FUN: Have fun exploring Indonesia and all its culture
